messages.title: £10billion extra for schools
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will reverse severe cuts by investing in a extra £10billion in schools. We should be investing in our children's futures, not damaging them. End Tory cuts to education and ensure our teachers have the resources needed for our children to learn. Mental health professionals in schools. Increased funding for youth services.

messages.title: People are fed up with the Brexit chaos.
messages.content: It has become a national embarrassment. Jeremy Corbyn's Labour party have aided and abetted the Conservatives on Brexit and have made it clear that they too are a party of Brexit. A vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit. Once we stop Brexit, we can tackle the climate emergency and inequality, properly fund schools and the NHS, and create opportunity for all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest £10billion extra for schools, end Tory cuts to education, ensure teachers have necessary resources, introduce mental health professionals in schools, and increase funding for youth services.
Stop Brexit, tackle the climate emergency and inequality, properly fund schools and the NHS, create opportunity for all.

issues.brexitEurope: A vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit.
issues.education: End Tory cuts to education, mental health professionals in schools, increased funding for youth services.
issues.health: Once we stop Brexit, we can...properly fund...the NHS

images.caption: Liberal Democrats Stop Brexit Build a Brighter Future
